text.div:
Id: gravitate-Pedro
status: final
Type: Patient summary Document
Subject: Pedro Gravitate
Sections:
Title: Problem List
Code: Problem list Reported (11450-4)
Entry: HIV
Entry: Depression
Entry: IBS
Title: Medication Summary
Code: Hx of Medication use (10160-0)
Entry: Dovato lamivudine and dolutegravir, 300 mg/50 mg
Entry: Mirtazapine 15 mg
Entry: Calcium carbonate 500 mg
Entry: Cinitrapide 1 mg
Entry: Collagen and magnesium supplements
Entry: Vitamin C supplements
Entry: Protein supplements

display.value: Dovato lamivudine and dolutegravir, 300 mg/50 mg

text.div: Age: 42 years. I live alone, single. Electronics store salesperson Smoker since the age of 20 Interests: cultural events and concerts. I enjoy mountain activities, skiing in winter and hiking the rest of the year. Health Conditions HIV (diagnosed with 38 years) Depression
